Headline: #126 Jackson buses Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Ashland
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Ashland, 76th, Loomis and 79th, due to fire department activity near 79th/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Ashland, 76th, Loomis, then resume their normal route on 79th, due to fire department activity near 79th/Ashland.

Allow extra travel time.
